sentences.english: This will activate your parasympathetic nervous system which will calm you down and slow your heart rate.
sentences.chinese: 这样能激活副交感神经，有助于安神和降低心率。

sentences.english: Eccentricity and spiral angle have different effects on pressure.
sentences.chinese: 偏心率和螺旋角对油膜压力有不同程度的影响。

sentences.english: Petting pets has been shown to reduce blood pressure and heart rates in adults.
sentences.chinese: 养宠物的成年人血压和心率都比较低。

sentences.english: I also took off the Garmin heart rate monitor.
sentences.chinese: 当然同时也取下了心率监测器。

sentences.english: But the study does not recommend that those taking exams use stimulants to boost their heart rate.
sentences.chinese: 但研究并不建议应考学生饮用兴奋剂饮料来增加心率。

sentences.english: One of the best ways to lose body fat is to keep your heart rate elevated for long periods of time.
sentences.chinese: 减少体脂肪的最好办法是长期保持心率的提高。

sentences.english: Alarms may be set for SpO2 and HR.
sentences.chinese: SpO2与心率均设置报警功能。

sentences.english: Pulsate rate of the heart can be displayed in digital method and monitored.
sentences.chinese: 这种电路可实现心率数字显示和心音放大监听。

sentences.english: This paper introduces some new developments concerning orbital eccentricity in stratigraphic and paleoclimatic studies.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了偏心率周期在地层和古气候研究方面的新发展。

sentences.english: Through a big eccentricity will result in a long cycle of this star system movement, the cycle is a finite value.
sentences.chinese: 即使绕转偏心率越大，周期越长，也总会有个周期吧。

sentences.english: Sinus bradycardia occurs when the heart rate falls below60.
sentences.chinese: 窦性心动过缓是心率低于60次。

sentences.english: The elevated heart rate and induced perspiration disintegrates the globules of fat and turns them into usable energy.
sentences.chinese: 提高心率和排汗都能把脂肪粒分解成可用的能量。

sentences.english: Heart rate in the young people almost equals golden section.
sentences.chinese: 在年青时的心率几乎等于黄金数。

sentences.english: With eccentricity increasing a single-mode single-polarization fiber is easier to make.
sentences.chinese: 偏心率越大越有利于制造单模单偏光纤。

sentences.english: A designed block diagram and two recorded dynamic heartbeat rate diagram are given.
sentences.chinese: 文中给出了设计方框图和实测动态心率变化记录图。

sentences.english: Vagus nerve to control heart rate through breathing.
sentences.chinese: 迷走神经能通过呼吸来控制心率。
